description: Active@ KillDisk Freeware is an easy-to use & compact utility that allows to sanitize storage media with the One Pass Zeros data sanitizing standard. It permanently erases all data on Hard Disks, Solid State Drives, Memory Cards & USB drives, SCSI storage & RAID disk arrays and even two disks in parallel.
summary: Install the free version of Active@ KillDisk. It can also create a Console Boot Disk.
author: LSoft Technologies Inc.
